description: Comprehensive IoT data collection system integrating Modbus TCP communication with REST API endpoints for industrial device monitoring.
features: Real-time Communication
Offline Data Persistence
Network Resilience
Bulk Data Processing

content.overview: We developed a comprehensive IoT data collection system that integrates Modbus TCP communication with REST API endpoints. This system enables real-time monitoring and data collection from industrial devices through a robust, scalable architecture that handles both online and offline scenarios.

sections.title: üì° Real-time Modbus TCP Communication
sections.content: Direct integration with industrial devices using Modbus TCP protocol for reliable data acquisition. The system continuously reads 8 registers from RUT200 routers with comprehensive error handling.
features: Direct Modbus TCP integration with industrial devices
Continuous monitoring of 8 device registers
Reliable data acquisition with error handling
Configurable device parameters and polling intervals

sections.title: üíæ Offline Data Persistence
sections.content: Local storage mechanism that preserves data during network outages, ensuring zero data loss with automatic synchronization when connectivity is restored.
features: Local JSON-based data storage during network outages
Zero data loss guarantee with offline buffering
Automatic bulk synchronization when connectivity restored
Intelligent data queuing and retry mechanisms

sections.title: üåê RESTful API Endpoints
sections.content: FastAPI-based backend providing robust API endpoints for data ingestion, status monitoring, and bulk data processing with comprehensive logging system.
features: FastAPI-based robust backend architecture
Single endpoint for efficient data ingestion
Support for both single and bulk data formats
Comprehensive error handling and logging system

sections.title: üîÑ Network Resilience
sections.content: Sophisticated offline handling with continuous connectivity monitoring, automatic fallback mechanisms, and intelligent error recovery for uninterrupted operations.
features: Continuous API server availability monitoring
Automatic fallback to offline storage mode
Intelligent error recovery and retry mechanisms
Network status tracking and reporting

Backend: Uvicorn - ASGI server for high performance
Python JSON - Data processing and storage

businessImpact: 99.9% data integrity with zero data loss during network outages
Real-time monitoring providing instant visibility into device status
Automated operations reducing manual intervention requirements
Scalable architecture supporting multiple devices and data types
